definition: title of respect for the queen mother or the emperor's father/nickname for Empress Dowager Cixi 慈禧太后[Ci2 xi3 tai4 hou4]

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: And she was taking me shopping to Galeries Lafayette .
sentences.chinese: 那一次，她還帶我去老佛爺百貨公司購物。

sentences.english: Shopping malls, like Lafayette and Printemps, were much more crowed than what I expect.
sentences.chinese: 老佛爺，巴黎春天等購物中心的人流超過我的預料。

definition: Buddha (term of respect for Sakyamuni 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/His Holiness (refers to a Buddhist grandee)/Buddha/God/emperor/in late Qing court, refers exclusively to Empress Dowager Cixi 慈禧太后[Ci2 xi3 tai4 hou4]
Moore or Moor (name)/see also 摩爾人|摩尔人[Mo2 er3 ren2]
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven
to have no sense of shame
lit. name is not in vain (idiom); a fully justified reputation/enjoys a well-deserved reputation
